name: Ion Square
wikiSummary: According to the Ion Square Songfacts, the lyrics in the chorus are taken from from a poem by E.E. Cummings, who is acknowledged in the liner notes.
wikiText: According to the Ion Square Songfacts, the lyrics in the chorus are taken from from a poem by E.E. Cummings, who is acknowledged in the liner notes. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
